Room.Name: Ivanhouse Sporting Arena - Beginner's Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Beginner's Circle in the Ivanhouse Sporting Complex.
Room.LongDescription: The Ivanhouse Sporting Arena is designed for more one-on-one combat with equally matched opponents. The Beginner's Circle allows you, with up to two of your comrades, to take on a human gladiator. The gladiator is tough, but you have a three-to-one advantage on him. If this isn't enough, you can always run away very quickly.
